neighbors.name: Floyd County Georgia
neighbors.claims: The Floyd County Board of Commissioners is the governing body responsible for zoning and land use policies in the county ([Floyd County Government](https://www.floydcountyga.gov/bc-board-commissioners)). In 2022, the county approved the purchase of approximately 44 acres of land (20 acres and 24 acres parcels) using 2017 SPLOST funds for a new Agriculture Center, rather than a 202-acre industrial park as originally drafted ([Floyd County SPLOST](https://www.floydcountyga.gov/splost/project/agriculture-center)). The Rome-Floyd Development Authority actively markets the 214-acre North Floyd Industrial Park for economic development ([Rome-Floyd Development Authority](https://developromefloyd.com/property/north-floyd-industrial-park/)). As of February 2025, the Board has placed an indefinite hold on commercial solar energy development and extended a moratorium on battery energy storage systems (BESS) while updating zoning ordinances ([KCHA News](https://kchanews.com/2025/02/05/floyd-co-supervisors-put-indefinite-hold-on-utility-scale-solar-development/)) ([KCHA News](https://kchanews.com/2026/01/23/floyd-county-supervisors-extend-bess-moratorium-in-place/)).
neighbors.influence_justification: High – County government maintains absolute regulatory authority over zoning, permitting, and moratoriums; currently enforcing holds on renewable energy projects.

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage directly with the Board of Commissioners and Planning Department regarding the current status of solar and BESS moratoriums. Highlight alignment with the updated ordinance requirements once finalized.

neighbors.profile_summary: Floyd County government is the primary regulatory body, currently enforcing moratoriums on solar and battery storage development while pursuing agricultural and industrial economic development elsewhere.

citations.claim: Governing body responsible for zoning and land use policies
citations.title: Floyd County Board of Commissioners

citations.claim: Approved purchase of ~44 acres for Agriculture Center using SPLOST funds
citations.title: Floyd County SPLOST Projects: Agriculture Center
North Floyd Industrial Park Property Profile

citations.claim: Placed indefinite hold on commercial solar energy development
citations.title: Floyd Co Supervisors Put Indefinite Hold on Utility Scale Solar Development

citations.claim: Extended moratorium on battery energy storage systems
citations.title: Floyd County Supervisors Extend BESS Moratorium

neighbors.name: Stenanista LLC
neighbors.claims: Stenanista, LLC is a Georgia limited liability company registered at 502 Bass Ferry Rd, Rome, with Stan Bouckaert listed as the registered agent ([Georgia Secretary of State](https://ecorp.sos.ga.gov/BusinessSearch/BusinessInformation?businessId=412401)). The entity is associated with the Bouckaert family, who own and operate Kingston Downs, a 5,000-acre property used for equestrian events, glamping, and outdoor recreation ([Kingston Downs History](https://www.kingstondowns.com/history)). In 2022, Stan Bouckaert successfully petitioned the Floyd County Commission (approved 7-0) for a Special Use Permit to develop a recreational camp and farm retreat on the property ([Floyd County Minutes](https://www.romega.us/AgendaCenter/ViewFile/Minutes/_04072022-337)). The family has actively developed the land for tourism, including adding hiking trails and cottages ([Kingston Downs History](https://www.kingstondowns.com/history)).
neighbors.influence_justification: High – Controls 5,000+ acres (Kingston Downs); successfully navigates local zoning processes with unanimous Commission support; prominent local business owner.

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach Stan Bouckaert to discuss visual impacts on Kingston Downs. The entity is a distinct 'agri-tourism' developer. Ensure project does not conflict with their glamping/retreat viewsheds.

neighbors.profile_summary: Stenanista LLC (Bouckaert family) controls the massive Kingston Downs estate. They are active developers of high-end outdoor tourism/recreation and have successfully engaged the county for their own zoning permits.

citations.claim: Registered as GA LLC with Stan Bouckaert as agent
citations.title: Georgia Secretary of State Business Search: Stenanista LLC

citations.claim: Successfully petitioned for Special Use Permit in 2022 (7-0 vote)
citations.title: Rome City Commission / Floyd County Minutes April 2022
Kingston Downs History: Transforming into Outdoor Destination

neighbors.name: Johnson Farm Property LLC
neighbors.claims: Johnson Farm Property LLC is a Georgia domestic LLC formed on March 5, 2012, listing 11 River Pine Dr SW, Rome as its principal address and Linda Owens as the registered agent ([Georgia Secretary of State](https://ecorp.sos.ga.gov/BusinessSearch/BusinessInformation?businessId=1703349&businessType=Domestic%20Limited%20Liability%20Company&fromSearch=True)). State filings indicate the business purpose is 'None,' typical of a holding company ([Georgia Secretary of State](https://ecorp.sos.ga.gov/BusinessSearch/BusinessInformation?businessId=1703349&businessType=Domestic%20Limited%20Liability%20Company&fromSearch=True)). The entity is a recipient of USDA agricultural conservation subsidies ([EWG Farm Subsidy Database](https://farm.ewg.org/top_recips.php?fips=13115&progcode=totalcons&page=6)). The principal address is also associated with 'Johnson Farms' ([EWG Recipient Detail](https://farm.ewg.org/persondetail.php?custnumber=A09180048&summlevel=address)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Low – Family farm holding entity; no evidence of public office, board seats, or significant political activity found for the entity or registered agent.

approach_recommendations.engage: Reach out to Linda Owens (registered agent) to discuss potential impacts on agricultural operations. As a recipient of conservation subsidies, the owner may be interested in land stewardship or conservation-compatible designs.

neighbors.profile_summary: Private family farm holding company receiving USDA conservation subsidies. No documented political activity or stance on development.

citations.claim: Formed in 2012 with Linda Owens as agent
citations.title: Georgia Secretary of State: Johnson Farm Property LLC

citations.claim: Recipient of USDA agricultural conservation subsidies
citations.title: EWG Farm Subsidy Database: Floyd County Conservation Recipients
